bullets: Deployed a data visualization feature using React/TypeScript that highlighted key insights derived from employee feedback surveys, allowing managers to make data-driven decisions based on specific demographic categories.

Leveraged Axios library to asynchronously retrieve employee insight objects and implemented client-side data filtering, sorting, and aggregation to meet functional design requirements and optimize front-end performance.

Facilitated weekly coordination meetings with the project manager and mentor to assess product functionality and suggest design improvements, resulting in the integration of 2-3 new features into the final product.
Maintained an 85% code coverage over unit tests through edge cases and mock data replication using Jest.

Optimized course tracking and assessment web application by refactoring more than 4000 lines of code using PHP, jQuery, and MySQL, resulting in a modular and readable codebase and enabling effortless sharing of landing pages.
Removed security risk by addressing vulnerable APIs with validation of client-inaccessible PHP session variables.

Enhanced the user experience by implementing HTTP response codes and snackbars for API calls, and creating exportable bar and pie chart data visuals using Chart.js for improved user information digestion.
